pr_title: Prevent resource leak in datapull response

timeline.message: Prevent resource leak in datapull response
Prevent resource leak in datapull response

timeline.bodyText: This line should be enough to resolve the issue, so let me know if the other changes doesn't make much sense.
timeline.author: ShivamPokhriyal

replies.bodyText: Got it. yeah I do think globalizing variables for no reason should be avoided. Also HttpUtils.parseUserVisibleError only gets called for a specific response code 406 in old code , so that behaviour must be retained.
replies.author: shubham1g5

timeline.message: Revert changes to data pull response

timeline.author: shubham1g5

replies.bodyText: Yeah, RemoteDataPullResponse constructor expects a generic type.
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal
